titleStmt.title: Catesby: Labels on Specimens in the Sloane Herbarium

publicationStmt.p: Transcribed by Amy Hackney Blackwell, 2014. From digital imagery taken at the Sloane Herbarium, 2012.

div.p: A. humistrata Walt. - A. amplexicaulis [A.M. Vail]
A. humistrata Walt. = A. amplexicaulis Michx.
B. Catalpa L. Sp Pl. 622 i.49 Bignonia urucu foliis
Catesb Carol. i.50 T. sessile L. Sp. Pl. 340 Solanum et fl. purporeo
Cracea virginiana [? - possibly attached to next specimen?]
i. 63 Laurus Caroliniensis L. Borbonia L. Sp. Pl. 370 Pen label: This specimen might be the plant drawn in Catesby@ Hist. Carol. I@ t. 63 as: Lauryus Caroliniensis. Seripo A. Koskerman (???) 1937
i.16 Quercus an potius Ilex Marylandica etc. Quercus Phellos L.Sp.P. 994
i.16 Quercus Anpotius@ etc. Quercus Phellos L.Sp. Pl. 994
i.17 Quercus sempervirens etc. -- virens tor in Ait. H. Kew. iii.356. Quercus Phellos B. L. Sp. Pl. 994!
i.18 Quercus castaneae foliis etc. Chestnut Oak Sp. Pl. 995
i.19 Quercus (forte) Marilandica@ etc. 2 nigra Quercus nigra B.L.Sp. Pl. 996!
i.20 Quercus folis non serrata@ etc. Q. nigra L.Sp.Pl. 995! Q. aquatica
i.21 Quercus alba Virginianum. Quercus alba L.Sp. Pl. 996
i.27 Cornus mas@ etc. Cornus florida L. Sp. Pl. 117
i.29 Aristolochia pistolochia@ etc. A. Serpentaria L.Sp. Pl. 961
i.34 Populus nigra@ etc. P. balsamifera L. Sp. Pl. 1034
i.41 Tupelo Arborea@ etc. Nyssa aquatica L.Sp.Pl. 1058; [pencil sketch of fruit next to sample]
i.44 Althea Floridana. Gordonia. Hypericum Lasianthus L. Sp. Pl. 783
i.49 Bignonia Urucu@ etc. B. Catalpa L. Sp. Pl. 622
i.60 Tupelo arbor Nyssa aquatica L. Sp. Pl. 1058
i.62 Acer virginianum@ etc. Acer rubrum L.Sp. Pl. 1055
i.66 Alnifolia Americana@ etc. Clethra alnifolia L. Sp. Pl. 396 Andromeda paniculata L.Sp. Pl. 394@ vol. 2 43
i.67 Juglans nigra L. Sp. Pl. 997
i.71 Frutex oblongis@ etc. Andromeda arborea L. Sp. Pl. 394
i.9 Castanea pumila@ etc. Sp. Pl. 998
ii.33 Frutex trifolius resinosus@ etc. fide index but ii.33 is Amyris elemifera Ptelea trifoliata L.
ii.58 Lilium Carolinianum@ etc. philadelphicum L. (??????)
ii.65 Stirax Aceris folio Sp. Pl. 999
ii.65 Stirax aceris folio. Liquidambar styraciflua L. Sp. Pl. 991 [449?]
ii.83 Frutex Virginianus trifolinus@ etc. Ptelea trifoliata L.
ii.98 Chamaedaphne foliis Tini@ etc. Kalmia latifolia L. Sp. Pl.
Ilex Cassine L. Sp. Pl. 125; Ilex Cassine L. a. latifolia Ait. fest. locus[??????]
Kalmia latifolia L. Sp. Pl. 391 ii.98 Chamaedaphne foliis Tini@ etc.
Lonicera marilandica L.Sp. Pl. 175; ii.78; Gentiana forte?
N. aquatica L.Sp.Pl. (in ???) 1058. Nyssa uniflora Wanger i. 60 Tupelo Arbor
Q. Phellos etc. L. Sp. Pl. 994 i.22 Quercus humilios@ etc
referred to i.23 (Quercs Esculi divisura@ etc.) in list but that represents Q. rubra see Sp. Pl. 212.78. Quercus Catesbaei Mich. Hist. Chenes Am. No. 17.t.29!
see Hort New ii 301 and Sol. Mss x 111.67
see note by Macfarlane on f. 21
Sp. Pl. 394. i.71 Frutex foliis oblongis@ etc.
Sp. Pl. 71 i.32 Gramen Myloicophoron@ etc.
The Root of this plant the Indians esteem good for the Bite of the Rattlesnake.
This label has no connection with the specimen
This was subsequently named by Solander Kriegia. See So. Hort 4471 syn = Helenium nudiflorum

Trillium cernuum L. Sp. Pl. 340. See Smith Spiciles f. 4. Catesby Carol. i.45 Sonumte fl. carneo. See Journ. Bot. 1901 (1907?) 321-335; Photographed Febr. 1967 Reg. No. N 1187; Trillium Catesbaei Elliott Fl. S. Carol. i.429 (1817)
